short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to edit a IC-Hosting Static Site's Content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A tool for IC-Hosting clients to edit their CMS website.

If you have not been instructed by IC-Hosting to install this plugin, your probably should not. It does nothing except offer some enhanced tooling for IC-Hosting customers.
